title.rendered: Large LED Open Sign Bright Neon Light for Restaurant Bar Pub Shop Store Business

content.rendered:
• 【 USA INVENTORY IN STOCK 】Ship within 1 business day handling time, buy with full confidence.
  •  【 Large Size 】True 21” X 10” X 1.5″ Large size rectangle super bright OPEN sign. It easily fits between window and blinds.
  •  【 Saves 80% Energy 】Ultra bight LED Open Signs are much brighter and much more visible than regular Neon sign with much lower energy consumption rate 
  •  【 Flashing or Static Mode 】To meet different needs. Switch between two different modes, static or blinking, to attract all kinds of clients
  •  【 Get Your Business Seen Day or Night 】Delivering the eyes-catching intensity through windows. Energy-efficient SMD LEDs with high visibility even during the daytime
  •  【 Professional Grade 】Ultra bright elegant in color Neon LED Open Sign for all business.100.000 Hours of Operation Time
  •   【 Much Brighter than Neon 】Ultra bright, striking RED and BLUE SMD LEDs
  •  【 Last Longer 】This LED OPEN sign built with HDPE plastic and high quality components. Simple and attractive design enhances the outlook of your business
  •  【 Fast Installation 】Hanging hardware included: chains & fixing hooks. Also includes AC/DC 6 feet corded adapter
  •  【 Versatile 】Suitable as Office Open Signs, Restaurant Open Signs, Deli Open Signs, Super-Market Open Signs, Auto Shop Open Signs, Barbershop Open Signs, Bar Pub Open Signs, Hotel and much more.
  •  【 Gran cartel abierto LED Brillante 】 Gran letrero luminoso LED abierto letrero de neón de bienvenida para restaurante bar con animación intermitente de control remoto

excerpt.rendered:
• Get Your Business Seen Day and Night
  • This is Neon Glass Open Sign Alternative Super Bright LED Open Sign with up to 80% saving of energy 
  • Large Ultra Bright Illuminated LED Open Sign, Neon LED Open Sign with Remote Control
  • Big Size ( True Size of 21 x 10 x 1.5 inches ) FLASHING LED Open Sign catching eyes Daytime and Night for Florist Shop, Restaurants, Bakery, Diner, Grill, Pub, Bars, Café Coffee Shop, Office, Store, Retail Shops, Hotel, Motel, Spa, Barbershop, Car Repair Shop, Gas Station.
